Dictum (Inevitable7 Evoc): Nonlawful creatures in 40' radius with equal/-1/-5/-10 HD deafened for 1d4 rd (DC 19 Will neg)/staggered for 2d4 rd (DC 19 Will for 1d4 rd)/paralyzed for 1d10 min (DC 19 Will for 1 rd)/killed (DC 19 Will suffer 3d6+20 HP) and banished (DC 19 Will -4 neg)

Protection From Chaos (Inevitable1 Abju): Touched gains +2 AC and saves, suppresses mental control, and bars contact by nonlawful summoned creatures for 20 min
Rage (Insanity3 Ench): R300' 6 willing targets in 15' radius gain +2 Strength and Constitution, +1 Will, suffer -2 AC for conc + 20 rd
